comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Marie Renouard Thayer, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Benjamin Bowditch Thayer.   Probably a photo of her as a debutante in 1915-16 season.  Her father was a mining executive.  She married Junius Alexander Richards (c1892-1964, Harvard '15), a broker, in 1923.  They had three children (Reuben, Junius, and Benjamin), and divorced in 1942.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca, I believe you are correct. I was able to find an article in the Evening World newspaper in Chronicling America announcing her engagement and using this photo: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030193/1922-12-20/ed-....
